title: Why Choose Me Section
description:
Create Differentiators Section with Unique Selling Points

Build a visual differentiators section that showcases the business's key competitive advantages using a combination of icons and concise, first-person messaging.

Requirements:
- Display 3-4 distinct unique selling points arranged in a visually balanced layout
- Include the following differentiators:
  * Local expertise (emphasize community knowledge and regional understanding)
  * Transparent pricing (highlight upfront costs, no hidden fees)
  * Fast turnaround (specify typical completion timeframes)
  * Personalized service (emphasize customized approach and direct communication)
- Pair each differentiator with a relevant icon or visual element
- Write copy in first-person voice (e.g., "I provide" or "We offer") to create personal connection
- Keep messaging concise (1-2 sentences maximum per point)
- Ensure responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
- Maintain visual consistency with existing brand colors and typography
- Use clear visual hierarchy to make each point easily scannable

Consider:
- Icon style should match overall design system (outlined, filled, illustrated, etc.)
- Spacing and alignment should create visual balance
- Text should be benefit-focused rather than feature-focused
- Section should integrate seamlessly with surrounding page content
